import os

# Set up logging

# Load Spacy's English transformer model
try:
    nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_trf")
except Exception as e:
    logging.error("Error loading Spacy model: %s", e)
    exit(1)

# Expanded list of specific financial codes
financial_codes_info = [
    {"name": "ISIN", "length": 12, "description": "International Securities Identification Number: A 12-character alphanumeric code."},
    {"name": "CUSIP", "length": 9, "description": "Committee on Uniform Securities Identification Procedures: A 9-character alphanumeric code."},
    {"name": "SEDOL", "length": 7, "description": "Stock Exchange Daily Official List: A 7-character alphanumeric code."},
    {"name": "RIC", "length": "variable", "description": "Reuters Instrument Code: Varies in length; a ticker symbol followed by an exchange code."},
    {"name": "Bloomberg Ticker", "length": "variable", "description": "A proprietary identifier by Bloomberg L.P. for financial instruments and indexes."},
    {"name": "Ticker Symbol", "length": "variable", "description": "An abbreviation used to uniquely identify publicly traded shares of a particular stock."},
    {"name": "MIC", "length": 4, "description": "Market Identifier Code: A 4-character alphanumeric code."},
    {"name": "LEI", "length": 20, "description": "Legal Entity Identifier: A 20-character, alpha-numeric code."},
    {"name": "FIGI", "length": 12, "description": "Financial Instrument Global Identifier: A 12-character alphanumeric code."},
    {"name": "WKN", "length": 6, "description": "Wertpapierkennnummer: A six-character alphanumeric code used primarily in Germany."},
    {"name": "Valor Number", "length": "variable", "description": "Used predominantly in Switzerland for financial instruments."},
    {"name": "CFI Code", "length": 6, "description": "Classification of Financial Instruments: A 6-character alphanumeric code."},
    {"name": "Euroclear Code", "length": "variable", "description": "Used by Euroclear, mainly in European markets, to identify securities."},
    {"name": "NSIN", "length": "variable", "description": "National Securities Identifying Number: Part of the ISIN, varies by country."},
    {"name": "JWEL", "length": "variable", "description": "Japanese Securities Identification Code for Financial Instruments."},
    {"name": "KSIN", "length": "variable", "description": "Korean Securities Identification Number: Used in South Korea."},
    {"name": "TAIEX Index Code", "length": "variable", "description": "Used for tracking the Taiwan Stock Exchange capitalization-weighted stock index."},
    {"name": "NACE Code", "length": "variable", "description": "Statistical Classification of Economic Activities in the European Community."},
    {"name": "SWIFT/BIC Codes", "length": 8 or 11, "description": "Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication / Bank Identifier Code: Used for international banking transactions."},
    {"name": "CINS", "length": 9, "description": "CUSIP International Numbering System: A variant of the CUSIP for non-U.S. and non-Canadian issuers."},
    {"name": "QSIP", "length": "variable", "description": "Quasi-Securities Identification Procedure: A theoretical variant of CUSIP."},
    {"name": "OTC Code", "length": "variable", "description": "Over-The-Counter Code: Used for financial instruments traded via dealer networks."},
    # Add other codes as needed
]
